text: The District of Gjirokastër is one of the thirty-six districts of Albania. There are about 56,720 people. Many of its people are Greek.The Albanians, a scattered people, by Philippe Rekacewicz, Le Monde diplomatique, January 1999 The capital is Gjirokastër. It is part of Gjirokastër County. ==References== Category:Districts of Gjirokastër County
title: Gjirokastër District
